about.intro: Passionate backend developer with a strong foundation in computer science engineering and a keen interest in artificial intelligence and automation. I specialize in building scalable microservices, implementing AI-driven solutions, and creating efficient automation workflows. My experience spans across various technologies including Python, Java, and modern frameworks, with a particular focus on leveraging AI tools to solve complex business problems.
about.education: Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering with a focus on backend development and AI applications. I enjoy exploring the intersection of traditional software engineering and cutting-edge AI technologies.

projects.title: Job Discovery Platform with Gen AI
projects.description: Intelligent job matching platform that uses generative AI to analyze resumes and match candidates with relevant opportunities. Features include AI-powered resume analysis, personalized job recommendations, and automated application screening.
highlights: Reduced time-to-hire by 40% for partner companies

projects.title: AI-Powered Presales Automation
projects.description: Automated presales system that generates personalized proposals, analyzes client requirements, and provides intelligent recommendations. Integrates with CRM systems and uses natural language processing for document analysis.
highlights: Improved response time from 48 hours to 2 hours

projects.title: Metro Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Scalable microservices platform for metro transportation system including route planning, real-time tracking, payment processing, and passenger analytics. Features event-driven architecture and high availability design.

projects.description: AI-powered code review assistant that automatically analyzes pull requests, suggests improvements, and identifies potential bugs. Integrates with GitHub and provides detailed feedback on code quality and security.
